statements: DELETE FROM MarketData WHERE date = '2022-01-01' AND symbol = 'AAPL';
DELETE FROM MarketData WHERE symbol = 'GOOG' AND volume > 10000;
DELETE FROM portfolio_data WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND volume > 10000;
DELETE FROM market_data WHERE date = '2022-01-10' AND stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
DELETE FROM market_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM portfolio_performance WHERE strategy_id = 3 AND returns < 0.05;
DELETE FROM historical_stock_data WHERE stock_symbol='ABC' AND date='2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM sector_performance WHERE date>'2022-09-01' AND performance_index<=0.5;
DELETE FROM Investment_Trends WHERE trend_score < 0.5 AND trend_date < '2022-01-01';
